name: Emery Wonder
description:
This is a playable demo of the first chapter only. The rest of the game is still in early development.

An adventure across the universe

A strange phenomenon has struck the small city of Ayra. Everyone has suddenly vanished, and there is no trace of where they went. Join Callan on his adventure to discover what happened. There is something big happening, and the answer lies across the universe.

Features
  • Explore the world: With vast landscapes and dungeons, there are many places to discover!
  • Uncover lore: Want to learn about the world of Emery Wonder? Dig deep and you will learn everything!
  • Blast through enemies: Snappy and to-the-point combat, this turn-based battle system let's you make strategic decisions while respecting your time. Don't feel like fighting?  Dodge enemies or knock them unconscious!
  • Engage in your adventure: Interacting, slashing, dashing, climbing, lifting, pushing, shooting; it's going to take you everything to traverse the world!
  • Discover: There are many discoveries to be made, from finding secret gear, mystic creatures, to special items and hidden rooms!
  • Experience a true adventure: There are several parts of Emery Wonder, but they all come together to truly give you a sense of grand adventure and wonder!
